entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023
